PerfectNetExp.abs: 驱虫药(anthelmintics)，以驱除或杀灭肠道寄生虫为主要作用的一类中药。本站内容由网友添加和整理，仅供学习和参考。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 17th cent. (as an adjective): from anth- (variant of anti 'against') + Greek helmins, helminth- 'worm' + -ic

means.word_mean: 1. a medication capable of causing the evacuation of parasitic intestinal worms
1. capable of expelling or destroying parasitic worms
